data.what_is:
1SEO began as a two-person startup out of a crammed downtown apartment, where Founder  Lance Bachmann and his sister, Jolin, made it their mission and commitment to deliver communication and results for every client who trusted them to grow their brand. 

Today, with CJ Bachmann at the helm as CEO, 1SEO is home to over 100 employees at their Bristol, PA office and offers a full-suite of digital marketing solutions including: search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click advertising (PPC), website design and development, content and social media marketing, and much more.

1SEO.com Digital Agency's customer-centric approach took the agency from a startup to an industry-leader, and earning them their coveted Google Premier Partnership and Facebook Marketing Partnership, awarded only to the top 1% of digital marketers. Since 2009, 1SEO has cultivated it's team and talents, each year expanding, and receiving numerous prestigious industry awards including three US Search Awards titles.

What separates 1SEO from the competition in Philadelphia, and throughout the industry, is our agency's transparent approach to drive results for our clients. With 1SEO, you'll have a clear understanding of each campaign's performance, budget allocation, creative execution,  and monthly reporting.

Regardless of your industry, or your digital marketing needs, we firmly believe in cultivating business relationships built on trust, long-term strategies, and meaningful creatives to drive growth and results.

1SEO.com Digital Agency's Services Include:
- Search Engine Optimization (Local, National, International)
- SEO Consulting
- White Label SEO
- Website Design & Development
- E-Commerce Development
-Mobile & App Development
-Pay-Per-Click Advertising
-Social Media Optimization
-Social Media Marketing
-Content Marketing
-Optimized Web Content
-Print & Graphic Design
-Video Production & Photography
-Reputation Management & Branding
- & Much More!
data.product_description: 1SEO.com is a leading Digital Marketing Agency in the Philadelphia, PA area providing end-to-end solutions for clientele present in various genres of business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Record Breaking Months since starting with 1SEO
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Our account reps, Chris and Denise, are just great. They explain the process so we can understand and they have helped us reach record-breaking months 3 of the 6 months we've been with them.  Each month has been better than the month before.  We have weekly meetings so they are very accessible and quick to respond to any needs.

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
We haven't had any issues with 1SEO so far. We did have an account rep change and we were afraid that was going to be a bad situation as it usually is. But our new rep is just as good or better than our first rep.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
Very transparent, very open to any ideas, they obviously know what they are doing. We trust them. Our digital budget is larger than it's ever been and it is certainly money well spent. Page views up 43% YoY, New users up 29% and goal completions up 844% YoY.

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were having a hard time breaking into a suburb that was very important to us. In less than 6 months we rank at the top with every keyword.

What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
We work with Chris and Denise. The insight they provide helps us understand our results, and speaking of results, that's really what we like best. They get results!

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
There's nothing that stands out that is negative. When something does comes up that we feel needs adjustment, they are very quick to respond.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
We have worked with some other agencies in the past, but 1SEO stands above the others. Professional, responsive, knowledgeable, and they get results!

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
They are keeping us front and center when people are searching for what we do. We are the, or one of the first businesses shown.

Describe the project or task 1SEO Digital Agency helped with:
Digital Marketing and Website Design.

What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Working with them is great. The time that they take to explain everything to you and make sure that you understand everything is second to none. I've worked with several agencies in the past and they did not want to take the time and make sure that you understood. Any questions you have are answered quickly and they celebrate your success just like its their own.

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Nothing that I really dislike at the moment. You couldn't ask for someone better to work with.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
Do it sooner rather than later!

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
Acquiring new customers in our market area. They have helped us increase our overall revenue by 30% in the last 30 days.

Describe the project or task 1SEO Digital Agency helped with:
The team has helped me with all things digital for our company!

What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Communicates well and does a great job explaining the process and what is to come.

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
There is nothing I dislike so far. The only thing that gets a little confusing is having different people coming at you with different things and trying to comprehend it all. BUT, I also think that is what made things move along so efficiently.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
Just do it already!

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our digital marketing is now under one roof and streamlined. Our marketing was all over the place prior, and now it is rocking and consistent across all of the platforms.

Describe the project or task 1SEO Digital Agency helped with:
I hired 1SEO to grow my law firm and they have helped increase my lead volumes and their customer service is unbeatable!!

What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
I love that my team members respond quickly and are helpful

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Sometimes I have to make changes to the content.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
Talk with 1SEO to find out what products and services they can offer you and your business!

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
They helped with me getting more phone calls and business leads. They are also in the process of building me a new website.

What do you like best about 1SEO Digital Agency?
1SEO executes at a very high level. I'm amazed at how responsive the people are and the quality of the work product. This is a top-notch organization!

What do you dislike about 1SEO Digital Agency?
Nothing yet, I've been impressed with the entire process and all the people I've interacted with.

Recommendations to others considering 1SEO Digital Agency:
1SEO moves fast and makes a big impact to grow your business.

What problems is 1SEO Digital Agency solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our digital marketing performance had plateaued with a strong & well-respected agency. 2 months with 1SEO has gotten us growing again for immediate results!
